name: Primidone
indications: primidone , used alone concomitantly anticonvulsants , indicated control grand mal , psychomotor , focal epileptic seizures . may control grand mal seizures refractory anticonvulsant therapy .
warningsAndPrecautions: primidone tablets , usp 50 mg : white white , round tablets debossed ‘ λ ’ one side scored side bottles 100 ( ndc 72603-609-01 ) 500 ( ndc 72603-609-02 ) . 39 250 mg : white off-white , round , scored tablets debossed ‘ λ ’ score line & ‘ 40 ’ score line one side plain side bottles 100 ( ndc 72603-610-01 ) . storage store 20° 25°c ( 68° 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . dispense tight , light-resistant container child-resistant closure . manufactured : northstar rx llc memphis , tn 38141. toll-free : 1-800-206-7821 manufactured : rubicon research ltd. , thane 421506 , india . trademarks property respective owners . rev . 01/2025
adverseReactions: primidone contraindicated : 1 ) patients porphyria 2 ) patients hypersensitive phenobarbital ( actions ) .
indications_original: Primidone, used alone or concomitantly with other anticonvulsants, is indicated in the control of grand mal, psychomotor, and focal epileptic seizures. It may control grand mal seizures refractory to other anticonvulsant therapy.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Primidone Tablets, USP
                  
                  
                     50 mg :White to off white, round tablets debossed with ‘Λ’ on one side and scored on the other side in bottles of 100 (NDC 72603-609-01) and 500 (NDC 72603-609-02). 
                                                                                               39

 
                  
                     250 mg :White to off-white, round, scored tablets debossed with ‘Λ’ above the score line & ‘40’ below the score line on one side and plain on the other side in bottles of 100 (NDC 72603-610-01).

 
                  
                     Storage
                  
                  
                     Store at 20° to 25°C (68° to 77°F); excursions permitted to 15° to 30°C (59° to 86°F)
                     [see USP Controlled Room Temperature].
                  
                  
                     Dispense in a tight, light-resistant container with a child-resistant closure.
                  
                  Manufactured for: 
    Northstar Rx LLC 
    Memphis, TN 38141. 
    Toll-Free: 1-800-206-7821
 
                  Manufactured by: 
    Rubicon Research Ltd., 
    Thane 421506, India.
 
                  Trademarks are the property of their respective owners. 
    Rev. 01/2025
